c74object.name: fl.coordinatesystem~
c74object.digest: Converts vectors of triples between cartesian and polar values.
c74object.description: Inputs should either be a cartesian triple (x, y, x) or polar tripe (azimuth, elevation, radius). Missing values are assumed to be zeroes. Extra values are ignored and the output is also a triple.

entry.name: 0. /mode [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the conversion mode.
[0] - polar->cartesian [1] - cartesian->polar
